Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-RoleClassCaseSubject

Language: en

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a CASEBJ

name: RoleClassCaseSubject
title: RoleClassCaseSubject
description: A person, non-person living subject, or place that is the subject of an investigation related to a notifiable condition (health circumstance that is reportable within the applicable public health jurisdiction)
